title: PM Modi's Doppelganger Walks Into A Crowd With Body Guards In Mangalore, Video Goes Viral
text:
PM Modi's Doppelganger Walks Into A Crowd With Body Guards In Mangalore, Video Goes Viral

PM Modi's Doppelganger Walks Into A Crowd With Body Guards In Mangalore, Video Goes Viral

Abhinandan Pathak seemingly made an appearance again and like always, drove the crowd into a frenzy.

For those unaware, according to a reddit user, Pathak is a man from Uttar Pradesh's Lucknow and is famous for his uncanny resemblance to Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

During the 2014 Lok Sabha election, Abhinandan Pathak used his face and energy to aggressively campaign for the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and Narendra Modi, who was the party's prime ministerial candidate then.

In a video that's going viral, Pathak can be seen walking into the crowd with a whole 'army' of body guards, in what looks like an election rally.

Don't Miss 28.9 K SHARES 11.9 K SHARES 6.9 K SHARES 3.9 K SHARES 6.5 K SHARES

He dresses and speaks like Modi and begins his speech with 'Mitron' (friends), the go-to word PM Modi frequently uses to address his audience.

A resident of Saharanpur, Pathak was with the BJP-led NDA constituent Republican Party of India (Athawale) as its state vice-president for Uttar Pradesh, till he joined the Congress.
description: For those unaware, man from Uttar Pradesh's Lucknow has an uncanny resemblance to Prime Minister Narendra Modi. During the 2014 Lok Sabha election, Abhinandan Pathak used his face and energy to aggressively campaign for the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and Narendra Modi, who was the party's prime ministerial candidate then.
